name: rx-extra
description: rx-extra extends the library RxJS 5 with extra methods like 'fromNodeReadableStream' and 'splitOnChange'

scripts.clean:es5: rm -rf main.js main.d.ts observable operator add
scripts.compile:es5: npm run clean:es5 && tsc --project tsconfig.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.compile:esnext: npm run clean:esnext && tsc --project tsconfig.esnext.json && echo ok || echo not ok
scripts.prepare: ALLE_DIR='../../../'; if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d $ALLE_DIR/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...'; (cd $ALLE_DIR; npm run 'rx-extra:build'); else npm run build; fi
scripts.prepublishOnly: ALLE_DIR='../../../'; if [ ! -d ./node_modules ] && [ -d $ALLE_DIR/node_modules ]; then echo 'Alle configuration detected. Testing from the top-level alle directory...'; (cd $ALLE_DIR; npm run 'rx-extra:test'); else npm run test; fi
scripts.test: mocha test/spec/api.js --reporter min --colors && echo ok || echo not ok

author: Anders Riutta
